title: Advances in morphology-controlled alumina and its supported Pd catalysts: synthesis and applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00776F, Review Article
Yanpeng Yang, Chenglin Miao, Ruoyu Wang, Rongxin Zhang, Xiaoyu Li, Jieguang Wang, Xi Wang, Jiannian Yao
This review highlights the preparation and regulation strategies of alumina materials from different dimensions and summarizes the preparation, metalâ€“support interaction, and application of Pd/Al2O3 catalysts on important industrial catalysis.
